title: 有效的完全平方数 (Valid Perfect Square)
content: 思路: // @Title: 有效的完全平方数 (Valid Perfect Square) // @Author: qisiii // @Date: 2024-09-06 17:21:32 // @Runtime: 0 ms // @Memory: 39.5 MB // @comment: // @flag: class Solution { public boolean isPerfectSquare(int num) { int left=1,right=num; while(left<=right){ int mid=left+(right-left)/2; long sum=(long)mid*mid; if(sum==num){ return true; }else if(sum>num){ right=mid-1; }else{ left=mid+1; } } return false; } }
